# Invopop

## Docs

- [Authorize Enrollment](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/access/enrollment/authorize.md): Authenticate using application credentials and a specific owner ID, token, or enrollment.
(Only Applications!)
- [Fetch Enrollment](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/access/enrollment/fetch.md): Fetch the enrollment details for the current authentication token. (Only Applications!)
- [Update Enrollment](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/access/enrollment/update.md): Update the embedded configuration details of an enrollment. (Only Applications!)
- [Fetch Workspace](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/access/workspace/fetch.md): Fetch the workspace details associated with the current authentication token.
- [Update Workspace](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/access/workspace/update.md): Update the workspace details associated with the current authentication token.
- [Generate a PDF preview](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/pdf/preview.md): Generate a PDF preview of the provided GOBL document.
- [Upload Proof of Ownership PDF](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/peppol/ownership-upload.md): Upload proof of ownership document for company registration in the Peppol network.
- [Generate Agreement PDF](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/verifactu/agreement-fetch.md): Generate a PDF agreement of a previously prepared org.Party silo entry.
- [Upload Agreement PDF](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/verifactu/agreement-upload.md): Upload a signed copy of the PDF agreement.
- [Confirm](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/verifactu/confirm.md): Confirm that the upload process has completed.
- [Upload Identity Image](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/apps/verifactu/identity-upload.md): Upload an image of an identity document.
- [Authentication](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/authentication.md): Generate an access token to start using an Invopop workspace.
- [Technical Glossary](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/glossary.md): A brief glossary of the main terms used in the platform.
- [Idempotency](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/idempotency.md): Ensuring API requests are safe.
- [Introduction](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/introduction.md)
- [Build with LLMs](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/llms.md): Build with Large Language Models (LLMs)
- [Create a series entry](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/entries/create-a-series-entry.md): Create a new entry in a given series idempotently with the given UUID (any version).
- [Fetch a series entry](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/entries/fetch-a-series-entry.md): Fetch an existing entry in a series given its UUID.
- [Fetch all series entries](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/entries/fetch-all-series-entries.md): Fetch all the entries in a given series.
- [Overview](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/entries/overview.md): An entry represents a single index or code number inside a series. Essentially, it's a mapping of a UUID to a code number.
- [Introduction](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/introduction.md): The Invopop Sequence service makes it easy to reliably generate sequential numbers.
- [Create a series](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/series/create-a-series.md): Create a new series idempotently with the given UUID (any version).
- [Fetch a series](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/series/fetch-a-series.md): Fetch an existing series given its UUID.
- [Fetch all series](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/series/fetch-all-series.md): Fetch all the series in the current company.
- [Overview](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/sequences/series/overview.md): A series is in effect a placeholder for a counter with number formatting details to be able to generate a code.
- [Fetch a file](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/files-fetch.md): Download silo entry file's data. Content type and disposition will be set according to the source.
- [Upload a file](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/files-put.md): Add a new file to a silo entry. This is only available to applications with 'enrolled' scope at this time.
- [Create an entry without UUID](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/create-an-entry-post.md): Create a new silo entry without an explicit UUID.
- [Create an entry with ID](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/create-an-entry-put.md): Create a new silo entry with the given UUID.
- [Fetch all entries](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/fetch-all-entries.md): Fetch all the silo entries in the current company.
- [Fetch an entry](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/fetch-an-entry.md): Fetch an existing silo entry given its UUID.
- [Fetch an entry by key](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/fetch-an-entry-by-key.md): Fetch an existing silo entry by its key.
- [Find related entries](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/find-related.md): Find silo entries whose document mentions the given entry's UUID.
- [Search entries](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/search-entries.md): Perform a free-text search on all documents in the current company.
- [Update an entry](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/entries/update-an-entry.md): Update an existing silo entry given its UUID.
- [Build GOBL Document](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/gobl/build.md): Build GOBL Envelopes or Objects for validation purposes
- [Correct GOBL Envelope](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/gobl/correct.md): Correct or determine the correction options for a GOBL Envelope (not Object!)
- [Sign GOBL Document](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/gobl/sign.md): Sign GOBL Envelopes or Objects
- [Delete a file](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/spool/delete.md): Delete a previously uploaded entry from the spool.
- [Download a file](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/spool/download.md): Download a previously uploaded entry from the spool.
- [Upload a file](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/silo/spool/upload.md): Upload temporary file data to the silo spool. Requires 'enrolled' scope.
- [Create a job without a UUID](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/jobs/create-a-job-post.md): Create a new job without an explicit ID.
- [Create a job with a UUID](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/jobs/create-a-job-put.md): Create a new job with the given ID.
- [Fetch a job](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/jobs/fetch-a-job.md): Fetch an existing job by ID.
- [Fetch a job by key](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/jobs/fetch-a-job-by-key.md): Fetch an existing job by a recent key.
- [Create a workflow](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/workflows/create-a-workflow.md): Create a new workflow with the given UUID.
- [Fetch a workflow](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/workflows/fetch-a-workflow.md): Fetch an existing workflow given its UUID.
- [Fetch all workflows](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/workflows/fetch-all-workflows.md): Fetch workflows in the current workspace.
- [Update a workflow](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/transform/workflows/update-a-workflow.md): Update an existing workflow given its UUID.
- [Ping](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/utils/ping.md): Simple ping request
- [UUID](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/utils/uuid.md): UUID Generator
- [Versioning](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/api-ref/versioning.md): API versioning allows us to grow our product without breaking your integration
- [AT Portugal](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/at-portugal.md): Submit certified invoices and periodic SAF-T data to Portugal’s Autoridade Tributária.
- [Chargebee](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/chargebee.md): Import and process invoices and credit notes from Chargebee
- [ChorusPro France](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/choruspro-france.md): Submit B2G invoices to the French ChorusPro system.
- [DIAN Colombia](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/dian-colombia.md): Submit invoices to the Colombian DIAN system.
- [Documentos Fiscais Electônicos Brazil](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/documentos-fiscais-electronicos-brazil.md): Send NFC-e & NFS-e documents to the tax authorities in Brazil via Plugnotas.
- [Email](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/email.md): Send emails from your workflows, with or without attachments.
- [Facturae Spain](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/facturae-spain.md): Convert GOBL into the Spanish Facturae format
- [Google Drive](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/google-drive.md): Store your assets and data in Google Drive
- [ILYDA Greece](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/ilyda-greece.md): Submit invoices to the Greek IAPR via the myDATA platform.
- [Discover Invopop Apps](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/index.md): Explore Invopop apps that extend platform functionality with government integrations, third-party services, and workflow automation tools.
- [InvoiceXpress Portugal](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/invoicexpress-portugal.md): Submit certified invoices and periodic SAF-T data to Portugal’s Autoridade Tributária through InvoiceXpress
- [KSeF Poland](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/ksef-poland.md): Submit FA_VAT invoices to Poland's KSeF system.
- [NetSuite](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/netsuite.md): Generate legally compliant invoices from Netsuite
- [OASIS UBL](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/oasis-ubl.md): Convert GOBL to the OASIS UBL format.
- [PDF Generator](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/pdf-generator.md): Generate legally compliant PDFs from your GOBL sources
- [Peppol](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/peppol.md): Submit invoices to the Peppol network.
- [Portal](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/portal.md): Convert a simplified invoice or receipt into a full invoice
- [SAT Mexico](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/sat-mexico.md): Issue CFDI invoices, onboard suppliers, and manage compliant submissions to Mexico's tax authority (SAT).
- [SDI Italy](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/sdi-italy.md): Issue and receive invoices through Italy's SDI system.
- [Slack](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/slack.md): Send notifications from your workflow via Slack
- [Smart Receipts Italy](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/smart-receipts-italy.md): Issue documento commerciale in Italy
- [Spain](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/spain.md): Look up and correct Tax IDs in Spain
- [Stripe](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/stripe.md): Import and process invoices and credit notes from Stripe
- [TicketBAI Spain](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/ticketbai-spain.md): Convert and send invoices to the Spanish tax authorities using the TicketBAI system.
- [UN/CEFACT CII](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/uncefact-cii.md): Convert GOBL to the UN/CEFACT CII format.
- [VERI*FACTU Spain](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/apps/verifactu-spain.md): Convert and send invoices to the Spanish tax authorities using the VERI*FACTU system.
- [Invoicing compliance in Belgium](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/belgium.md): Comprehensive guide to Belgium's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, Peppol implementation, and upcoming e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Brazil](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/brazil.md): Comprehensive guide to Brazil's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, Notas Fiscais implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Colombia](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/colombia.md): Comprehensive guide to Colombia's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, FEV implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in France](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/france.md): Comprehensive guide to France's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, Peppol and ChorusPro implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Germany](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/germany.md): Comprehensive guide to Germany's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, XRechnung and ZUGFeRD implementation, and upcoming e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Regulatory definitions](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/glossary.md): A brief glossary of the main terms used in regulations and invoicing.
- [Invoicing compliance in Greece](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/greece.md): Comprehensive guide to Greece's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, EN 16931 implementation, and myDATA e-reporting obligations for B2B, B2C, and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Italy](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/italy.md): Comprehensive guide to Italy's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, FatturaPA and Documento Commerciale implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B, B2C, and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Mexico](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/mexico.md): Comprehensive guide to Mexico's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, CFDI implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B, B2C, and B2G transactions
- [Poland's invoicing e-regulation timeline](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/poland.md): Comprehensive guide to Poland's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, KSeF implementation, and e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Portugal](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/portugal.md): Comprehensive guide to Portugal's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, ATCUD/QR implementation, and SAF-T e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [Invoicing compliance in Spain](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/compliance/spain.md): Comprehensive guide to Spain's mandatory e-invoicing requirements, VERI*FACTU, TicketBAI, and Facturae implementation, and SII e-reporting obligations for B2B and B2G transactions
- [API Keys](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/api-keys.md): Access your workspace from anywhere
- [Apps](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/apps.md): Add country support and features to your workflows
- [Document Contents](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-content.md): Files, Activity, Meta and GOBL Envelope
- [Correcting an Invoice](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-correct.md): How to correct issued invoices with credit notes
- [Create documents](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-create.md): From the console and the API
- [Edit documents](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-edit.md): Edit documents through the console
- [Replicate documents](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-replicate.md): Replicate documents through the console
- [Document Types](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/doc-types.md): Schemas supported by Invopop
- [Console](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/index.md): Manage documents, configure workflows, connect Apps and collaborate with your team, from a single place.
- [Search](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/search.md): Search documents
- [Series](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/series.md): A series is a placeholder for a counter with number formatting details to be able to generate a code.
- [Workflow Conditions](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-conditions.md): Configure a workflow in Invopop to process documents.
- [How to create a Workflow](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-create.md): Configure a workflow in Invopop to process documents.
- [Customize workflow templates](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-edit.md): Update workflow definitions, steps and triggers.
- [Workflow history](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-history.md): Monitor and inspect jobs, the execution steps of workflow runs.
- [Workflows Overview](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-intro.md): Configure a workflow in Invopop to process documents.
- [Workflow versions](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/console/workflow-versions.md): View and manage workflow versions
- [Understanding Invopop's pricing](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/get-started/pricing.md): Usage and cost of issuing invoices and other documents through Invopop
- [Quickstart](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/get-started/quickstart.md): Sign up instructions and getting your first sandbox working
- [Authentication](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/authentication.md): After completing this quick start guide you'll have generated and tested an authentication token that can be used in all subsequent requests to the Invopop API.
- [Documentos Fiscais Eletrônicos Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/br-dfe.md): Issue Documentos Fiscais Eletrônicos in Brazil
- [Chargebee](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/chargebee.md): Import and process invoices and credit notes from Chargebee
- [DIAN Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/co-dian.md): Issue invoices and credit notes in Colombia through the DIAN.
- [XRechnung Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/de-xrechnung.md): Generate compliant B2G invoices in Germany.
- [ZUGFeRD Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/de-zugferd.md): Generate compliant invoices in Germany.
- [Email Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/email.md): An application to send emails from your workflows, with or without attachments.
- [Spanish Tax ID Lookup (AEAT)](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/es-lookup.md): Verify Spanish tax IDs (NIF/CIF) and normalize names in workflows using AEAT.
- [TicketBAI Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/es-ticketbai.md): Issue invoices in the Basque Country with TicketBAI.
- [VERI*FACTU Invoicing Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/es-verifactu.md): Issue invoices in Spain with VERI*FACTU.
- [VERI*FACTU Supplier onboarding](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/es-verifactu-supplier.md): Create and register suppliers in Spain with VERI*FACTU.
- [Chorus Pro Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/fr-chorus-pro.md): Issue invoices to French public institutions with Chorus Pro.
- [Factur-X Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/fr-facturx.md): Generate compliant invoices in France (Factur-X).
- [PDP (Plateforme de Dématérialisation Partenaire)](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/fr-pdp.md): Guide for France PDP e-invoicing setup and approval status
- [What is GOBL?](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/gobl.md): Learn about GOBL (Go Business Language), the universal format for structured business documents used by Invopop
- [GOBL Builder Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/gobl-builder.md): An interactive, low code tool for building GOBL documents.
- [myDATA & IAPR Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/gr-iapr.md): Send invoices and credit notes to the Greek IAPR via the myDATA platform.
- [How to go live](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/how-to-go-live.md): Ready to issue real invoices? Here are the next steps
- [SDI Receiving Invoices Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/it-sdi-receiving.md): Receive and process electronic invoices from Italy's SDI system
- [SDI Sending Invoices Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/it-sdi-sending.md): Generate and issue electronic invoices through Italy's SDI system
- [Smart Receipts Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/it-ticket.md): Issue e-receipts in Italy
- [CFDI & SAT Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/mx-sat.md): Issue CFDI documents in Mexico using the SAT Mexico provider.
- [Guides](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/overview.md): Get started, configure workflows, and achieve compliance across different countries and integrations.
- [PDF Invoice Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/pdf-invoice.md): How to issue simple PDF invoices globally.
- [Peppol Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/peppol.md): How to issue and receive electronic invoices through the global Peppol network
- [KSeF Poland Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/pl-ksef.md): Generate and issue electronic invoices through Poland's KSeF system
- [AT Portugal Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/pt-at.md): Issue documents in Portugal using Invopop's certified implementation.
- [InvoiceXpress Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/pt-invoicexpress.md): Issue invoices in Portugal using InvoiceXpress as a provider.
- [Related Documents](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/related-docs.md): Configure linked documents using UUIDs.
- [Series Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/series.md): Learn how to create and use series to generate sequential codes for your documents.
- [Slack](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/slack.md): Simple connection to Slack for sending messages.
- [Stripe](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/stripe.md): Import and process invoices and credit notes from Stripe
- [Update Exchange Rates](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/update-exchange-rates.md): Update the exchange rates of your invoice to the latest values published by the ECB.
- [Webhooks Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/webhooks.md): Integrate your system with Invopop through webhooks.
- [White Label](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/white-label.md): Integrate Invopop in your platform to offer e-invoicing to your customers.
- [Workflows Guide](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/guides/workflows.md): Configure a workflow in Invopop to process documents.
- [Documentation](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/index.md): Invopop helps you issue, receive, and process business documents—such as invoices and receipts—in compliance with local tax regulations across our supported countries
- [Set up your account for multiple countries](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/workspace/multi-country.md): How to organize your workspaces for multiple countries
- [From sandbox to live](https://invopop-church.mintlify.app/workspace/sandbox-to-live.md): Configure your payment method and live account
